summary: This document is an email chain between Assistant United States Attorneys in the Southern District of New York, discussing a focus group exercise related to the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. It includes the exchange of mock opening statements and defense presentations, with plans to share deliberations and compiled takeaways.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The focus group exercise and attached mock opening statement are related to her criminal trial.

events.title: Focus Group Exercise for Maxwell Trial
events.description: Prosecutors conducted a focus group exercise, presenting the government's case and defense presentations, with plans to review deliberations and compile takeaways.

locations: One Saint Plaza, New York, NY
keyFacts: Prosecutors in the Ghislaine Maxwell case conducted a focus group exercise on September 27, 2021.
A mock opening statement for the defense (titled 'Maxwell Mock_Opening_v2.docx') was exchanged among the attorneys.
The government's closing presentation and defense presentations were shared as part of trial preparation.
The email chain involves Assistant United States Attorneys from the Southern District of New York coordinating post-exercise follow-up, including video deliberations and a compiled memo of takeaways.
